description: Adds a member (user or group) to the resource's set of delegates.

parameters.name: OrganizationId
parameters.description: The organization under which the resource exists.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description: The resource for which members (users or groups) are associated. The identifier can accept ResourceId, Resourcename, or email. The following identity formats are available: Resource ID: r-0123456789a0123456789b0123456789 Email address: resource@domain.tld Resource name: resource.

parameters.name: EntityId
parameters.description: The member (user or group) to associate to the resource. The entity ID can accept UserId or GroupID, Username or Groupname, or email. Entity: 12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789012 or S-1-1-12-1234567890-123456789-123456789-1234 Email address: entity@domain.tld Entity: entity.
